sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; const Experience = () => { return ( <>

Experience

Fleet administration

Dynergic Construction Co

Headed the fleet team managing a busy and varied truck and trailer fleet, overseeing compliance, identifying cost savings, and building strong relationships with customers and suppliers.

  • Oversaw all aspects of compliance regarding servicing and MOTâ€™s resulting in a 100% compliance rate
  • Managed vehicle returns at the end of lease / spot rental, checking paperwork and recording vehicle condition. Assist with tracking and recording all fleet activities
  • Documented all financial reports and provided timely reports .Monitored all drivers and ensured driver can legally drive a vehicle
  • Managed all requests and prioritized it according to requirement. Assisted various departments and completed all jobs related to projects

    • December 2021 - Present

    Front End Developer-Trainee

    Pioneer Software Park Private Limited
    Project Name: Kpost
    (07/2021 - 12/2021)
  • Coordinate with the web development team to design user interfaces for client websites using HTML,CSS,Bootstrap JavaScript, and ReactJS
  • Design, develop, and code web applications for customer accounts, which includes debugging issues, diagnosing root causes, and identifying solutions
  • Skilled in using Bootstrap library to quickly build project UI's and using ReactJS framework to associate HTML element to model{" "}
  • Involved in the complete development of front end programming and designing the user experience interface, UI requirements using RactJS ,Involved in creation of Reactforms and its validation using React forms module
    • Project Name: CMS
    (01/2021 - 06/2021)
  • Proficient in implementing UI development prinicples to ensure that product client-side serves at scale
  • Created custom AngularJS components for internal framework. Worked with a team of developer to resolve front-end and css issues
  • Involved in the complete development of front end programming and designing the user experience interface, UI requirements using Angular Js ,Involved in creation of angular forms and its validation using angular forms module

    • January 2021 - December 2021

    Internship

    Besant Technologies
    (06/2022 - Present)
  • Internship experience in Fullstack development. Expertized experience in UI Development with HTML, CSS , JavaScript, ReactJS, SQL ,JAVA and AWS
  • Creation , Updating and maintence of company websites
  • By Using ReactJS ,firebase ,HTML ,CSS , and some frameworks. I have created my own project like resume bulider, resume and ecommerce site{" "}
  • {" "} Write application interface code with Javascript.Experience in creating Responsive and adaptive web desgins
    • {" "} Project-Home Security Using AI
    (01/2022 - 01/2022 )
  • A novel approach for security system using artificial intelligence by using raspberry Pi and AI based door security and remote door unlock system
    • Barola Technologies
    (12/2018 - 12/2018)
  • Basics of Arduino and its Application
    • December 2018 - Present
    ); }; export default Experience;
